assertionTimeout.description: [TestCafe] set the amount of time within which assertion should pass

browsers.description: [TestCafe] browsers to run the tests on

items.description: name of the browser including arguments

clientScripts.description: [TestCafe] Scripts to inject into the tested pages

oneOf.description: Script to inject into the tested pages

items.description: Scripts to inject into the tested pages

concurrency.description: [TestCafe] number of concurrent browser instances to run

debugMode.description: [TestCafe] execute test steps one by one pausing the test after each step

debugOnFail.description: [TestCafe] pause the test if it fails

dev.description: [TestCafe] enables mechanisms to log and diagnose errors

devServerTarget.description: [Angular] Dev server target to run tests against.

disableTestSyntaxValidation.description: [TestCafe] disables checks for 'test' and 'fixture' directives to run dynamically loaded tests

fixture.description: [TestCafe] run only fixtures with the specified name

fixtureGrep.description: [TestCafe] run only fixtures matching the specified pattern

fixtureMeta.description: [TestCafe] run only fixtures with matching metadata

host.description: [TestCafe] Host to use to run TestCafe on (only if devServerTarget is not set), default = localhost

live.description: Enables live mode. In this mode, TestCafe watches for changes you make in the test files and all files referenced in them (like page objects or helper modules). These changes immediately restart the tests so that you can see the effect.

pageLoadTimeout.description: [TestCafe] set the amount of time within which TestCafe waits for the `window.load` event to fire on page load before proceeding to the next test action

ports.description: [TestCafe] the ports to run TestCafe on

proxy.description: [TestCafe] specify the host of the proxy server

proxyBypass.description: [TestCafe] specify a comma-separated list of rules that define URLs accessed bypassing the proxy server

oneOf.description: [TestCafe] enable the quarantine mode and configure the following quarantine mode settings: successThreshold (default: 3), attemptLimit (default: 5). The value of the AttemptLimit parameter must be greater than the value of the successThreshold parameter.

reporters.description: [TestCafe] specify the reporters and optionally files where reports are saved

path.description: enable screenshot capturing and specify the path to save the screenshots to

takeOnFails.description: take a screenshot whenever a test fails

pathPattern.description: use patterns to compose screenshot file names and paths: ${BROWSER}, ${BROWSER_VERSION}, ${OS}, etc.

customCompilerModulePath.description: specify the path to the module that exports the compiler

configPath.description: specify the path to the TypeScript configuration file

selectorTimeout.description: [TestCafe] set the amount of time within which selectors make attempts to obtain a node to be returned

skipJsErrors.description: [TestCafe] make tests not fail when a JS error happens on a page

skipUncaughtErrors.description: [TestCafe] ignore uncaught errors and unhandled promise rejections, which occur during test execution

speed.description: [TestCafe] set the speed of test execution (0.01 ... 1)

src.description: [TestCafe] Tests to run: file or glob. You can use one or more file paths or glob patterns to specify which tests to run.

ssl.description: [TestCafe] specify SSL options to run TestCafe proxy server over the HTTPS protocol

stopOnFirstFail.description: [TestCafe] stop an entire test run if any test fails

test.description: [TestCafe] run only tests with the specified name

testGrep.description: [TestCafe] run only tests matching the specified pattern

testMeta.description: [TestCafe] run only tests with matching metadata

tsConfigPath.description: [TestCafe] Specifies the TypeScript configuration file location

pageRequestTimeout.description: [TestCafe] sets the timeout for webpage requests
